General.Name: Donkeyrepublic Holding AS
General.Description: DonkeyRepublic Holding A/S, a data driven technology company, provides bike sharing solutions in Europe. The company develops software which enables the rental of bikes. It offers pedal bikes and e-bikes. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

3.Name: Mr. Alexander  Frederiksen
3.Title: Co-Founder, Head of Bus. Devel. & CSO
